itunes:title: Episode 453 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/23/19 - The Longest Sports Week
title: Episode 453 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/23/19 - The Longest Sports Week
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the longest week in sports... the week before NFL starts.  We also discuss the British Open, why Tiger Woods early exit was heartbreaking, the players who could be moved before the MLB trade deadline, why OBJ shoul...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the longest week in sports... the week before NFL starts.  We also discuss the British Open, why Tiger Woods early exit was heartbreaking, the players who could be moved before the MLB trade deadline, why OBJ shouldn't talk to the media, and why NBA megastars should sit out of the FIBA Championship in China.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the longest week in sports... the week before NFL starts.  We also discuss the British Open, why Tiger Woods early exit was heartbreaking, the players who could be moved before the MLB trade deadline, why OBJ shouldn't talk to the media, and why NBA megastars should sit out of the FIBA Championship in China.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the longest week in sports... the week before NFL starts.  We also discuss the British Open, why Tiger Woods early exit was heartbreaking, the players who could be moved before the MLB trade deadline, why OBJ shouldn't talk to the media, and why NBA megastars should sit out of the FIBA Championship in China.
